languages.text: "Не понимаю, что так раскалило злобу в твоей душе. Эта комната не отличается от прочих". {n}Судя по спокойному взгляду эльдарки, она знала, что вы за ней наблюдаете.{/n}

"I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не понимаю, что так раскалило злобу в твоей душе. Эта комната не отличается от прочих". {n}Судя по спокойному взгляду эльдарки, она знала, что вы за ней наблюдаете.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I don't understand why is your soul burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}Judging by the Aeldari's calm gaze, she knows that you were watching her.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我不明白你的灵魂为何因愤怒而燃烧，这个房间和别的房间并没有任何不同。”{n}伊莉耶特平静的目光中没有一丝惊讶。看来，你一踏进这个房间，她就注意到你探究的视线了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不明白你的灵魂为何因愤怒而燃烧，这个房间和别的房间并没有任何不同。”{n}伊莉耶特平静的目光中没有一丝惊讶。看来，你一踏进这个房间，她就注意到你探究的视线了。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No entiendo por qué tu alma arde con tanta furia. Esta sala no es distinta a las demás». {n}No hay un solo atisbo de sorpresa en la serena mirada de la Aeldari, lo que sugiere que ya era consciente de tu presencia (y tu escrutinio) desde el momento en que entraste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No entiendo por qué tu alma arde con tanta furia. Esta sala no es distinta a las demás». {n}No hay un solo atisbo de sorpresa en la serena mirada de la Aeldari, lo que sugiere que ya era consciente de tu presencia (y tu escrutinio) desde el momento en que entraste.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi votre âme est consumée par la colère. Cette pièce n'est pas différente des autres. » {n}Vous ne décelez aucune surprise dans le regard calme de l'Aeldari, ce qui laisse penser qu'elle avait immédiatement perçu votre présence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi votre âme est consumée par la colère. Cette pièce n'est pas différente des autres. » {n}Vous ne décelez aucune surprise dans le regard calme de l'Aeldari, ce qui laisse penser qu'elle avait immédiatement perçu votre présence.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe nicht, warum Eure Seele vor Wut brennt. Das hier ist ein Raum wie jeder andere." {n}In dem ruhigen Blick der Aeldari liegt kein Hauch von Überraschung, was darauf hindeutet, dass sie deine Anwesenheit – und deinen prüfenden Blick – schon bemerkt hat, als du den Raum betreten hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe nicht, warum Eure Seele vor Wut brennt. Das hier ist ein Raum wie jeder andere." {n}In dem ruhigen Blick der Aeldari liegt kein Hauch von Überraschung, was darauf hindeutet, dass sie deine Anwesenheit – und deinen prüfenden Blick – schon bemerkt hat, als du den Raum betreten hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜお前の魂が怒りに燃えているのか、理解できない。この部屋は他の部屋と何も変わりはないではないか」{n}アエルダリの冷静な視線には驚きの色は微塵もなく、あなたが入ってきた時点から、彼女はあなたの存在と、監視の目に気づいていたことを示唆している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜお前の魂が怒りに燃えているのか、理解できない。この部屋は他の部屋と何も変わりはないではないか」{n}アエルダリの冷静な視線には驚きの色は微塵もなく、あなたが入ってきた時点から、彼女はあなたの存在と、監視の目に気づいていたことを示唆している。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Neden ruhunun öfkeyle tutuştuğunu anlamıyorum. Bu odanın diğerlerinden hiçbir farkı yok." {n}Aeldari'nin sakin bakışlarında hiç şaşkınlık gözükmüyor. Bu, içeri girdiğinden beri burada olduğunun ve onu gözetlediğinin farkında olduğunu gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why your soul is burning with anger. This room is no different from any other." {n}There is no flicker of surprise in the Aeldari's calm gaze, suggesting she has been aware of your presence — and scrutiny — since you entered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neden ruhunun öfkeyle tutuştuğunu anlamıyorum. Bu odanın diğerlerinden hiçbir farkı yok." {n}Aeldari'nin sakin bakışlarında hiç şaşkınlık gözükmüyor. Bu, içeri girdiğinden beri burada olduğunun ve onu gözetlediğinin farkında olduğunu gösteriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
